nodes.text: "The Beast Within" (German title "Das versteckte Monster") is a comic strip written by Alec Worley, drawn by Bob Molesworth and edited by Gunther Nickel. The story was published in the 3rd issue of the German Star Wars Rebels Animation-Magazine, which was released on July 11, 2018. It was first published in English in the November 2019 issue of the Australian magazine K-Zone.
